channel.title: {DELTA} {317} How can I make a PkBox?
channel.description: Well I have a Button and all for the PkBox, But I don't know how to make an area were there is a box in the wild were it is safe and outside of it, is not. Can someone please help?

item.title: {DELTA} {317} How can I make a PkBox?
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

You need to make a boolean. Something like this

public boolean isInFunPk(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if ((absX <= CoordX) || (absX >= CoordX) ||(absY <= CoordY) || (absY >= CoordY)){ return true; } return false; }

Read full topic
